name: Fairy Magic Skillz Tournaments
description:
Remove two or more cubes of the same color. Earn the highest score before time runs out.

Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
From the creators of Fairy Mahjong comes the online multiplayer puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Join the Skillz community and play against real people for free with virtual currency or win real money and prizes (where available).
Skillz real money tournaments and leagues are available in about 75% of the world. Real money tournaments are not enabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, IL, LA, MD, MT, SC, SD and TN. If you live in these regions, you can still play for fun with 'Z' virtual currency.

Feel free to contact us: support@artexgames.com
If you have any questions about the Skillz system or real money tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
